wikipedia_page.main: Colin Edwynn (23 September 1933 – 31 October 2018) was an actor who appeared as PC Jimmy Conway in the British television soap opera Coronation Street between 1967 and 1972.

response: * Colin Edwynn, actor who appeared in Coronation Street, and Heartbeat, lived in and operated "The Queens Head" pub in Tebworth
